page.title: 03Sports Clubs-Middle Barton
page.content: The Middle Barton Bowls Club has about 40 members and started just before the 2nd war.The club has men and women members and plays matches against surrounding villages and towns.They wear a white and grey uniform.They play on Saturdays and Thursdays and a full size green is availible all summer. We also have a boys and mens Football Team and a Ladies Netball Team.The boys Football Team play on Saturday mornings and the mens Team play on a Saturday afternoon.The Ladies Netball Team has been going since April 1985 and the 50p subs are paid every time they play. There is also a Judo club and a Tennis club.The Tennis club meet on Wednesday and Sunday at 7.00 until dark.The Judo Club meet on a Friday.Both boys and girls can attend.Noone can join after the age of eleven.
